Dafʻ al-iltibās ʻan munkar al-iqtibās

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copy completed at the end of Rabīʻ al-Ākhir 993 [April 1585], apparently from author's copy.
From the books of Abd ʻal-Salām al-Shaṭṭī al-Ḥanbalī al-Atharī, 16 Jumādá al-Ākhirah 1279 [December 8, 1862].
Foliated 176-182; paginated 1-12, both in Arabic numerals.
MS Arab 337. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
